m_szDocTitle: What The Joint Climate Policy Announcement From US And China Means
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Originally published on Rocky Mountain Institute . By Clay Stranger and Jon Creyts, Ph.D. Yesterday the United States and the People’s Republic of China reached an historic agreement in the global effort to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and address the impending consequences of climate change through commitments by President Obama and President Xi.
